SEARCH
Package com.hotelapplication.backend

Class HotelManager

java.lang.Object
com.hotelapplication.backend.HotelManager
public class HotelManager extends Object
The HotelManager class provides static methods to manage hotels, rooms, reservations, and various hotel information. It interacts with the DatabaseManager and DatabaseConnector to store and retrieve data.
Author:
Alexander Boutselis
